//import image

import wishLogo from "../Constant/wishlogo.png"

export default {
  backgroundColor: `${Colors.blue}`,
  frontImage: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/xEBakpPa207tLVc_xoU-WobW5n_0L2rTh1wLXW9CJ0Bh9SmRZAa9iAKENDe7kJKw8DWtZ6SeMY0hKCS6xxy4Of7epVfUNx4bNw0HvdXdNA57LQIz06GPkUDoNIWOtQRqF46hTBMohgpTxFoA0LkxtnT1UeAsp57LRoSQ05B9PK2w6aH494XOG3BH49i-A4zp_qXqAjBhUaSJtAqisJLSiFmOjwzxFBcAPzOx3WzCuFyd2KhhkuVEuniQ66NU-J-r6CMGcDBZyNIE3EMhMUtZjuBJx286GoH12KG5KfcmrbrvgDqV39bx9duu86gPFmyBRfLo2xMMrxkRFX2-ZBq39T4qa3Lj1TFq13hflezCBjC4hGRbWmfBIIQPf6ohkxDlJcsmQDsIabKiT8QoXBkLv9USMcXn1ZidONwN7SYUhgsXv5Le8dlMSK05QgVjIG-AAFdahK-7hWimHfVAGl2GIDMt09nQJl-iVjtsPnJwM3lih6-QUdWcd34OcQsuameMuP2fiVA5Ce4Q-yWbrFBRhWoN-DxsAzgzqqYe374XVdG9HWdGyFMgFTr2P2fiPI60JjraY3D7bBtuIip9Rs6PoItxmk3Z6TmdZNJfV95ZB3V9Icwx3xivgY5bgsJ9zEfNIQOZwbxL00otkTQZrPBLFymGy99kNsKCJTPtJik_zqOYLDsV4NroqExD1e8VnA=w680-h682-no?authuser=0",
  heroImage: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/IAFgG7t4Vs2vUSIFO3AkpEfhXI1su8NejH31f216NOPsbwG_-Gh6xFFzuGD_lumjd1Wxj7C0e-siwnAU_e7wyMAH4qm8z3aX44T7LBHKhHFoCg2YCjIMcX8X6xaTyvJnK0x8XLh5feAacByZNgJLR4mhFiFslpP913fsBqbXi5sjXh-4lbGnphCHyWmMsK7Nnelp8RBqOCf_YjFlTX_OAwQykKDbI6YQVqvDTsNCRgEMxaokwMd6UrmzS7qeodjuFaXXUI9_OzaAPi5gjvJLOvWFh0iGd8oQyYKmpimVh5ZgPSgqItpb4UN_Ta4PW3q4I1gWg28PS9U7DyYlNIcxJP9Yuh99f8CxKLD5J6m3ay-T_eR4kI0F-xHb01BBoXJeozIfrycSnFrQtSPexr4mCg5I3GS5nAvvKaxPT3lPQUP4UsNMzmWLsUV6QLSocqDRXbqYw2eUCW4Zj1C3gJY73AnCp05sqpaVUnMwIREL5blG3u4JNi7Yl_rl35qLrl8T36zuKbihSPRSkvPaHBJkGBFyGTSPn-WoA-AJjb1EnJm9VmccQIbY_-5AXcT1TABqPiCtzbo_wCaKeZe6zsJks61WW1FRAuJok7O56dh9_qCE_-otj0io2yJKvXngCKr6xEeEoFmFSN-tkQVZtXGV0_7ry19OIw8HJfHWommgGhxeVulhsTag5S6RJ24pQQ=w2732-h1230-no?authuser=0",
  program: wishLogo,

  //
  projectId: "Cash On Delivery",
  projectHightlight: "People in SEA can use Cash On Delivery as a Payment method",
  projectIntro: `Wish now offer users in SEA the Cash On Delivery payment option. 
  People can buy product at Wish without any concerns and they
  can pay the product to the carrier. We wish this new payment method can help
  increase the unique buyers in the SEA market`,
  projectMetrics: [
    "+GMV", "+ New Users", "A/B Test", "SEA Initiative"
  ],
  contributers: [
    {
      name: "Hank Ke",
      title: "Product Designer Intern @Wish",
      image: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/NeQQCxC9No-LUZFPOpSzrBXDzg-37k9zedf9AeLQI7yNbZeBdI3TiJOCX592YNmCMd99jTuzXuJicy8JtMmBoJa2DfB7ujk6OHzgGvpVvEGM4yccHG_kkXhLcK3GGpjAyGJ0PzXERcZMRts0p4-PUqaOfTPMMTxhBOW1ESNspXqKqvCgLyBtme_o6n2yv1BTiH62nM8Xg4VSw0f1U-ieiSUGIZVLY-cIaGqimDPjzPG1nkVVmz9GIynHvTwnKVnBvJxllom985RPbd1m_nnl5OS4ah6ZLapQ0BstLqNfvpnF3K3dcAJVsZcy5Hlkx-Nk3TUKEzlWOPF0zA95iUvz7hRQJ-l8oZqAkbxqAuH7ysXU4nXY_oQXwsXoHp0oUH9vEbnyj8wKnWPDYSpDHyRFWfOOsCa2uSJ2nVm-qUw9TSsrBIj56zP9dQz3iAmND-lDYb_vdHR1teE3FWItBeq_8_YwYblZDhpe1th1-JVdZ_UNsVmLE3vnGanVASh2ocBKfHyTk1aozfAmtQhjRzS3NQHeSPBdMt2-jHk-C_Ym8GhlL0VmchFGSJKjo41E5oEmdDVvFuIFPKyWlfXN7UuUv1jQk4jxsd066Psjh_m4Bz0wECS8qdsF-kCpY_BiWKQgHeCskAKQt5QVcSOarNKC7_4J3wDX7FpCA1Nf6wH8r9FcvFCGrX-8NlzUMkV6jg=w932-h1375-no?authuser=0",
      url: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/samlicmu/"
    },
    {
      name: "Sam Li",
      title: "Product Manager-Special Projects @Wish",
      image: "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5603AQFnjuYGEhA7uA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1596672000&v=beta&t=T3FNx8oBVR7DxpH1c5ycIwKf13eSKR0CAWUMSwL10Zs",
      url: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/samlicmu/"
    },
    {
      name: "Brandon Wirakesuma",
      title: "General Manager-Southeast Asia @Wish",
      image: "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQGpaH-4N9jWWQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1596672000&v=beta&t=dWBT9WHQGB9E-RfAr_Q-vSrO3xa0OJTj2DOLKwhlRP4",
      url: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/brandonwirakesuma/"
    }
  ],
  contentDetails: [

    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/VAtZNEicW-eJLIOmt1d1nH6mSgBnbm9DguDrv5oXjyCYttP9gW6ZHD2GvvNNiEfad2mjGLv7V48CWgqz151ajK-_MUVTv8poLRiEEUEsBDWOQnJAdLnLdoFKfoULWakvL2Y92ol5V-3OiDakAKGbkcEZPWR9WTkktvYr2N_68060_QozKdsQNRHSgS-ce6Sy3AbG3A53jUs7WTaEfMQiXl4WBz8GLbWaYsjI9UVT0iCFXH3PO5nMuxXZh35XWz1XbeRU8kjizPBioG2hPJ6ZF__mAA6CfubVXHjMe587zIySwtZGGzyjdBV7fcjvalxWl3bxcWakc0GytTZu5wWF61wP5WmDO6LL7AbMzdPHeopaf4U1sFTZFIEJnUdtQtEA_HnhKoLqhaGgp6E0ddr9cZdcHbTucyYTHxdpZUIvC-CJfIduN-AXpwgupUzc9mHu6HuBYUywyceboiyLwXmDgOUu4Xf3BcqUtPMyW-fiEJFqe1FX-Pbeaafapxmyac74SVazDbsHuSOTm-8Ilym2eWi0RPv2DwdAjJ1AGrCsjJFl9R8W0JjQV4sv-zk_ZSy4LwnhQ6Z68thGG2BQQoKH4eVqHR0Cu0rlQ-DnKnhtTSUQDCH1UvnEtlrcnwmPL7pj2Cl1k7AGtZlpI-vvOovGuqzu4Y0oZw8Dulwb0bWK7pEbizmrk3eLEDwPY4sLZw=w1037-h388-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "Why This Feature?",
      content: `
      The market insights generated by the marketing team showed that 60% of e-commerce transactions
      are still completed via Cash on Delivery. This pay-later-option
      can reduce the trail cost and barrier of buying a product at Wish, and it can help bond truth with users.
      As a result, it will increase the new user acquicition, unique buyer conversion rate.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/YJrv3sj9wYArAPOSKCjlbnkeooWKSCMmZqshEXyPrHrINq6hjXksd8sT9KYkw1YKamlmP6VA-_p_1V4g4IbFPIhpIF6tnw8GWnZvbbVg_TijOKRhvyBW-9YzsQU0mMiSWh1S7ZUPM1tO_BI3SWATu3WAaQe3xPf2B2v21eJgL8jSHz9kenL-yxaRXoGvChOS3VkJQntDnjidRe1jtbTSKVAzj5_MCpndUG0Bf4lepPYjsODPLEGO9-1QMHvnXYTq5DjBMvMN1y0usDIxbewdHwNLvHuuwcbpHEjsAHIUqWNwUsmhAObH_ZiG3mk9-DK7YBOgbbyoZxVatKHzihN5aWsSPrnMO5v9A1QkVP5x5ZM22kWHhbJIDGoLKn7fHA91iiaHlqORiPsXqZFSqxyqjY_VlZ1eFkNr0vbiJVjPFjVCyJlZXH4ERT7TSkke1V7y_vWvIjLdo0rxTEas0vQNZCOiff-sTanttXTk9l1OKWFPiPmCCZERExZAcEMJw4ttjUAYuMaGu6nl_g2HmWFWEjaWXH0NUcATxhz9Cpx8vYxx00mMGNiSsjTo-Q3vsIhVnFb21UF4NWtRYCyLGnwPjmW1cC8LmBDg0ac5pd7RNpNhZsq-gK_otzzLdU8qDRTzwLy6N0FHrgqJ6EbAA9_nRxHEkd8esCtVuiGQIPERMBFk6WLWZy9EiLYxMkPCXQ=w2074-h776-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "A/B Test Plan",
      content: `
      We want to understand how would Cash On Delivery effect to Wish's performance,
      thus we set up 50% users as a control group, keeping them on the current payment
      experience, and promote Cash on Delivery to another 50% users. 
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/JzaWy_lKVyhg_Uug7NmMxVTVCduqhzbC7PkoHRwgs36kZtFZKtqgz0mHxYKpl_ZUjyYMp0dTKXU3V4eexkKM26it7hqT_v-TRK-Kqh269aGYdxfrts4LNO96zuL_PKedkEb5a__1kjbj5wFNphr9a8A469LHaKdD0GXyEF4UKe9ZteajKasZQwIVRfOvpX7tlXV2BOnZ_AcL-JTPeHod7tDzFiuWsCr1wCx-dHE77JH97Fb6hcd7lf3e9jN8nZtFEtanemj8_X7SL_3ocwF1Ob-WcTPCvYoP67l6dzpvDnTCLKbTwTjrSe27xPlxVmHfIq7o5mImVNwjimLbOADwZkVTiO8IKXp9Yml0S-5b1VkQ0E0TBZGNFWv9a6ZKNeIbkTeQ-Gxua5NL386YUMZs3EivHjfkeqFwrDPoIzPL5r-5n7H6ca4GTxEulhrBrFOU5Gu7R4991iTn1ab1xRSbyJGzoy9C-TO2OoJpdxI9dj2tXLZrG8DN0h7G06in69dnqF4urZr15CCqtR4DgJhnyyBY7fv69ACFm_smo_jh-w-jNrjUFazrIWYRIWr8EdiHPKHJQ8zCy6G0j9_oLvHsfynX6vWvdN9r1zzMqGXhjFoxhe5yKBgmvTqfbntj3Z_BhlH-_oUa9UTww6IW61JB2xEl1Fnv9xTu4IbzE0LEsKukxVLwKebq4jcxauIj7g=w657-h246-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "User Study",
      content: `
      Before jumping into design,
      I conducted a user study in order to undestand the use case of 
      Cash On Delivery. I acquired 30 users who used Cash on Delivery before at SEA at www.usertesting.com. Get a lot of insights.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/rVxfVtriGR0fEsEEq-qKJHQhjNVU_P_Fyp3rD08OIoWsaYKyorCt699yzcvS3AAB0-1bLyopNeq5LhAMnzvipFfXe2Iri20ngEyLZ9vy0t-35CD7VYOR4_taMpYnwWlt2il1FEuAPN1KlgEcYm12dKjKRe7J1_jT9v5petYZLZgmpzzwbg2iQubYt-STjx5dHCo1eo6P02q4vgq6JAIEPusXH7QclzoqVymzWRBSZWLjOvQsac_tM_2dGlD73AKoIznP0FvlYEN1JwDLaDLNC8Sx7LUpynsDuDKcRsvAKfOh9PTLmnm2nY782ZdmEml4B96a0zGrYcnXBSZcL8f844QPLZITlXTsQHgRTV2zwGq4Jb0BRLk6gcBPr9iWt6_hKdQ-QkDFKZUNGfUBRyB77i8H9mA024QO42box88zIQaCPPGCwo2S9fIAFN9QOqwsBoHU2xTcXeFhDpYQEOnf5sf8QP3rnjBDod4T1QM5lFo6_5BUfSMk1s65c0pYeDuPauabLZQgaBv6hOLstJPmrxkdrrI8js0Xi7q-Q8tU0o9V2uuDNXjXKyrXK3906BCzNG5C1giFZMNoUQ6zTN0JT4-2FS6OgiNST87_9-Mb0jUKCOK1RgkRgLprc6z63Zp7HZKM7EbTQ1oQX-cb4uX0-hTg2oDI3ftMvTAlkE34_yfj1f71xObVSxBiAy9z8w=w2732-h1018-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "Competitive Analysis",
      content: `
      We knew that people in SEA mainly use Cash on Delivery at Shopee, Lazada, Amazonin, etc. 
      I ask them to walk me through COD experiece in those apps, and know the flow of other products.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/qgV91rNrHWd0-gj5oZ6W2Vf1F8Vm7sccNJ23enMmb8_9BLtHIbRQRIL9GwKPReoKU1i_d3YnTRgEmD2eE5GtOYKVlW2XkKJWJKCm-qmCvKM3HfZnaZPVnQLG5X30F7vg_1wE4OMf6DX0kS3GNbZTLU5c75QDgr9apIez5xneB2yoOq4Khhn_8DbaYkzpefm7truqmYiIC2eVaddNKRU6OxQpT4Qesd8lXJO2Plt5XwR23q5DiWazdN-_htplEj3LvfdylBvGLZ9qBzyrlhivwAXKgMWSQN-afnhQH9W6jG3t7sVDYAS9tmwH6DCIBaeB2wANACY0yrHD6MZc7etgcjX38lJns2c5U7pXu5QgUDg8cRaK7EGqeXe-rAk9HcW6a0iSOEANKp-N1f5MTMMadSegn-EWtggUhrhSeIK5CrHfSh0cutjwbWL0ggs6MxsyZHIcaocSxI8Wv6FxtlnjEq0xC4LBT07gIni0yJHe3Z7JwrRtaCIfZUS3w3OA4cmgH0gSXW6gXUzTN-TRI2GUn2P1yQ_WVJhhlI_w7mvUcdoFy5Dw_XtwBb7OJgNWYRME5gAEuVWf40ZDa9Zf3PnvEszATIm_ZC2KslkejIfrbVDmIpg1FYK_fsWKxvirCW68hgzwGElUaUHfe_ry0AemFYUYwU7qUyhrdjE012u6IuGz_fajN0185LOP77dgMw=w2732-h1096-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "Product Insights",
      content: `
      I came up with a mental model of how COD works, 
      with insights and painpoint for current Cash on Delivery experience.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/rC83lln_PK1iMXnsSklEHLKnKxp4SYrnGUSo04ZIfqbJjuIVWq5cO8qFMOyqKZLg7i0jZEa_mt5Le-83Mb4CTcpfTlIGTE_a0-AaNwyAJkCEo1S8CABp0AhLKUOQ5UBBG1vPs7jIDZBAkTr4kgjt9tWkP_2Qs7kCiutoBKTMBybbgeues5Sa2Ea-e98ERfHHh2x4mkA_KRWDVnVs354Zwg-OySqz_GSlvG4UCYp55-i5kxHTYapIFJpAqG4BcbkI6_cZ5eP6vvH2M0QrvNVPkFkOZt9IVpcpEbvFNRrjBNe0ItrC93bSPRBhhT6wD4Yy6SINK3zeWDajBwAWcRX0MGXV9-FhoNK2CdjCZts9zlrXVQnYcjc3dH6OxuubNYOy4VhU3FjaejgnkvfaxuB5BOcd9DColdxw70cmtfOrPEOLxgqOeaotOEJhSDDOGjBf12fQDXXpWKeDOUe78JwS7InN29GM7xWxO7fAzrVuyqSQW5qgl9H90I0mTfUkpKEmzhrhJnxJnW40cjMjG1Zk0mOROWvhApcF11mKMrISD7Ha-J7a6XTQ4yukxgFvghhUwIXxSUmwlzx0aFeHI1S3gIq7Xz4UqxDTxotOOB0zzEHFbpGiFgUL4fvovr78D09gXuyO-wMqR2IGgSITOma3AUlsfzs3QlztoSv4hSUC09us2fH9E4PShFrjZgHC6A=w2732-h664-no?authuser=0",
      subTitle: "Design Solution",
      content: `
      By wrapping up insights and painpoints, I narrowed down to 3 main user flows for the MVP.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "false",
      url: "https://overflow.io/embed/ACZ011",
      subTitle: "Flow1: Promote Cash On Delivery",
      content: `
      Considered that Cash on Delivery is a common thing in SEA, I conducted 
      a user study in order to map out and understand users' current experience and the 
      painpoints of using it. `
    },
    {
      isImage: "false",
      url: "https://overflow.io/embed/ACZ011",
      subTitle: "Flow2: Set up COD as payment option",
      content: `
      Considered that Cash on Delivery is a common thing in SEA, I conducted 
      a user study in order to map out and understand users' current experience and the 
      painpoints of using it. `
    },
    {
      isImage: "false",
      url: "https://overflow.io/embed/ACZ011",
      subTitle: "Flow2: Set up COD as payment option",
      content: `
      Considered that Cash on Delivery is a common thing in SEA, I conducted 
      a user study in order to map out and understand users' current experience and the 
      painpoints of using it. `
    },
   
  ]
}
